data.title: About: Bruce Ferguson (Australian Army officer)
data.meta_description: Colonel Ian Bruce Ferguson, DSO, MC (13 April 1917 – 21 December 1988) was an officer in the Australian Army who served in the Second World War and Korean War.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Colonel Ian Bruce Ferguson, DSO, MC (13 April 1917 – 21 December 1988) was an officer in the Australian Army who served in the Second World War and Korean War. (en)

대령 이안 브루스 퍼거슨(영어: Ian Bruce Ferguson, 1917년 4월 13일 ~1988년 12월 21일)은 제2차 세계 대전과 6.25 전쟁에 복무한 오스트레일리아 육군의 장교다. (ko)

dbp:caption

Ferguson with two US Army officers during the Korean War (en)
